page.title: 18FARMING
page.content: Ash Farm Horsmonden Small area of blackcurrants which are sent for commercial freezing LAND COVER Hops. Fruit, Grazing, Cereals, Trees, Gardens comprise lawns herbaceous borders shrubs rock plants water plants flowering trees fruit trees and vegetables of all kinds for the use of and sometimes sale by the owner Weeds. These include Valerian, Thistles, Nettles, Wild Blackberry, Groundsell, Cow Parsley, Common Vetch, Buttercup, Plantain, Yellow Iris, Docks, Convolvulus, Orache, purple loosestrife, knotgrass polyganum Haymans Hill Farm consists of Tunbridge Wells Sand and Wadhurst Clay which is why it grows hard fruit so well Hedges mostly Hawthorn, blackthorn
